alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Oneida (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 3:57PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Lincoln and southwestern Oneida Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 357 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over New Wood Wildlife Area, or 23 miles northeast of Medford, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Birch Trails Girl Scout Camp around 405 PM CDT. Tomahawk and Gilbert around 415 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Harrison, Woodboro and Rhinelander. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for north central Wisconsin.
